page.title: 02Home Life.
page.content: On{Sundays}we wake up around 9:OOam and me and my sister go in the lounge. We are both eleven years old. We watch television. My mum and dad sometimes wake up about 9:30am and my mum gets us our breakfast. We normally have bacon and eggs and a cup of tea. After that we go to watch football. Me and my sister and my dad go and my mum stays at home and gets ready for the pub.We get back at 12:20pm and they have to serve untill 2:30pm then we have our dinner we have gravy and roast beef, peas, carrots, Yorkshire puddings, and roast potatos. Then my dad goes to sleep and we watch television. Then my mum opens the pub and the pub shuts at 10:30pm and we go to bed at 9:30pm. My mum and dad go to bed around 11:45pm.
